What game distribution services do you use? why?
I own games on GOG (Good Old Games) because most games are cheaper than steam and have a wider selection of rpg and adventure games. Steam, because it has great sales and community. Desura, because it has a huge selection of indie games and mods. Green Man Gaming because I can trade old, unplayed games in for credit.
